## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (d58012db9491f6a27654a3a06c64891f7672090b72655cd319fa743a22ed8346)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'refocus-sgt-trust1' @ 2.2.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
